content.en: Biosimilar integration: Scientists are exploring the role of biosimilars in improving patient access to cancer therapies and reducing healthcare costs. They are using algorithms to integrate biosimilars into clinical practice, develop statistical methods for assessing the interchangeability of biosimilars, and determine the impact of variability on biosimilarity limits. These algorithms are helping researchers assess the efficacy and safety of biosimilar products, and identify roadblocks to their adoption in order to maximize their use and benefits.
content.da: Biosimilær integration: Forskere undersøger biosimilærers rolle i at forbedre patienters adgang til kræftbehandlinger og reducere sundhedsudgifter. De bruger algoritmer til at integrere biosimilærer i klinisk praksis, udvikle statistiske metoder til at vurdere udskifteligheden af biosimilærer og bestemme indvirkningen af variation på biosimilaritetsgrænser. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at vurdere effektiviteten og sikkerheden af biosimilære produkter og identificere hindringer for deres adoption for at maksimere deres anvendelse og fordele.
